Package nzilbb.ag.automation.util

Class AnnotatorDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • nzilbb.ag.automation.util.AnnotatorDescriptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CloneableBean
    public class AnnotatorDescriptor
extends Object
implements CloneableBean
    Provides information about an Annotator implementation, including what resources it provides and requires.
    Author:
    Robert Fromont robert@fromont.net.nz

    • Constructor Detail

      • AnnotatorDescriptor

        public AnnotatorDescriptor​(String annotatorClassName,
                           ClassLoader annotatorClassLoader)
                    throws ClassNotFoundException,
                           NoSuchMethodException,
                           InstantiationException,
                           IllegalAccessException,
                           InvocationTargetException,
                           ClassCastException
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        annotatorClassName - Fully-qualified annotator class name.
        annotatorClassLoader - Source of the class implementation.
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - If the annotator is not found by annotatorClassLoader.
        NoSuchMethodException - If the annotator has no default constructor.
        IllegalAccessException - If the annotator's default constructor is not public.
        InvocationTargetException - If the annotator's constructor throws an exception.
        InstantiationException - If the annotator is an abstract class.
        ClassCastException - If the annotator does not extend Annotator.

      • AnnotatorDescriptor

        public AnnotatorDescriptor​(File annotatorJar)
                    throws ClassNotFoundException,
                           IOException
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        annotatorJar - Java archive that contains the annotator implementation.
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - If no annotator is found.
        NoSuchMethodException - If the annotator has no default constructor.
        IllegalAccessException - If the annotator's default constructor is not public.
        InvocationTargetException - If the annotator's constructor throws an exception.
        InstantiationException - If the annotator is an abstract class.
        ClassCastException - If the annotator does not extend Annotator.
        IOException

      • getInfo

        @ClonedProperty
public String getInfo()
        Retrieves HTML-encoded description of the function of the annotator, for displaying to the user.
        Returns:
        The contents of the info.html file deployed with the annotator, or null if no information was provided.

      • hasConfigWebapp

        public boolean hasConfigWebapp()
        Determines whether the annotator includes a web-app for installation or general configuration.
        Returns:
        true if the class includes a web-app at config/index.html, false otherwise.
